name: equilibrist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who entertains people by balancing in difficult positions, especially high above the ground, or by balancing objects in difficult positions: He was the director of a troupe of acrobats and equilibrists. They were walking back and forth along the edge of the building like equilibrists. Compare

high wire

More examplesFewer examplesI believe that they are the best equilibrists in the world.The equilibrist must watch the object carefully and counteract any movement with an opposite movement.The equilibrist will be demonstrating his skills on the high wire. The equilibrist stood with one foot on the wire, juggling balls in the air.
